import React from "react"; import { Card, CardMedia, CardActions, CardContent, Typography, Button } from "@mui/material"; import moment from "moment"; import DeleteIcon from "@mui/material/Icon" import MoreHorizIcon from "@mui/material/Icon" import ThumbUpAltIcon from "@mui/material/Icon" const Post = ({post}) => { return (
{post.creator} {moment(post.createdAt).fromNow()}
{post.tags.map((tag) => `#${tag} `)}
{post.title} {post.message} ) } export default Post;
